mapper.select: select * from ( select da.obtid, to_char(ddatetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as ddatetime,WDIDF,rain,vis,lon,lat from WEICHAO.t_bridge_data da left join WEICHAO.T_BRIDGE_DETAIL de on da.obtid=de.obtid where da.obtid=#{obtid} order by ddatetime desc ) where rownum<=36 order by rownum asc
